Comment: A unique ID number for the billing record.
The ID number of the job that the billing record is attached to.
A descriptive name for the billing record.
The date that this billing entry is due on.
The subtotal on the billing record.
The total tax amount on the billing record.
The base retention percentage for the line.
The base retention rate for the line.
If the line has been invoiced, this field contains the ID number (SEQNO) of the invoice in the DR_TRANS table.
If the line has been invoiced, this field contains the invoice number for the invoice.
If the job is a sub-job, this field contains the ID number of the master job.
This field displays the ID number of the currency that the billing record is in.
The exchange rate for the line at the time of the transaction.
The retention due date.
The Retention 2 rate for the line.
The Retention 2 percentage for the line.
The Retention 3 rate for the line.
The Retention 3 percentage for the line.
The ID number of the GL account for this line.
The ID number of the GL sub-account for this line.
The retention amount realised on the line.
The Percentage Complete amount for the line.
The stockcode for the billing record.
The ID number of the narrative on the line, if there is one.
This field contains 'Y' if the line has been invoiced.
The Allocated Costs amount on the line.
